languages.text: "Неблагодарное отребье. Мы охраняем их, а пляшут на наших костях! Я запомнила это лицо. И еще вернусь".

traits.locale_text: "Неблагодарное отребье. Мы охраняем их жалкие жизни, а они готовы плясать на наших костях! Я запонила это лицо. И еще вернусь".

languages.text: "Ungrateful scum. We guard them, and they dance on our bones! I will remember that face, and I will come back."
languages.original_text: "Неблагодарное отребье. Мы охраняем их, а пляшут на наших костях! Я запомнила это лицо. И еще вернусь".

traits.locale_text: "Ungrateful scum. We guard them and they dance on our bones! I will remember that face. And I will come back."
"Ungrateful scum. We guard them and they dance on our bones! I will remember that face. And I will come back."
"Ungrateful scum. We guard them and they dance on our bones! I will remember that face, and I will come back."
"Ungrateful scum. We guard them and they dance on our bones! I will remember that face, and I will come back."
"Ungrateful scum. We guard them, and they dance on our bones! I will remember that face, and I will come back."
"Ungrateful scum. We guard them, and they dance on our bones! I will remember that face, and I will come back."

languages.text: "Undankbarer Abschaum. Wir bewachen sie und die tanzen auf unseren Knochen! Das Gesicht merke ich mehr, und ich komme zurück!"
languages.original_text: "Ungrateful scum. We guard them, and they dance on our bones! I will remember that face, and I will come back."

traits.locale_text: "Undankbarer Abschaum. Wir bewachen sie und die tanzen auf unseren Knochen! Das Gesicht merke ich mehr, und ich komme zurück!"

languages.text: «Chusma desagradecida. ¡Les protegemos y bailan sobre nuestros cadáveres! Me he quedado con esa cara y volveré».
languages.original_text: "Ungrateful scum. We guard them, and they dance on our bones! I will remember that face, and I will come back."

traits.locale_text: «Chusma desagradecida. ¡Les protegemos y bailan sobre nuestros cadáveres! Me he quedado con esa cara y volveré».

languages.text: 「恩知らずのクズどもめ。我々は連中を守っているのに、奴らは我々の骨の上で踊りやがる！あの顔、絶対に忘れんぞ。必ずやり返してやる」
languages.original_text: "Ungrateful scum. We guard them, and they dance on our bones! I will remember that face, and I will come back."

traits.locale_text: 「恩知らずのクズどもめ。我々は連中を守っているのに、奴らは我々の骨の上で踊りやがる！あの顔、絶対に忘れんぞ。必ずやり返してやる」

languages.text: “那些忘恩负义的渣滓。我们保护他们，可他们却在我们的骨头上跳舞！我会记住那张脸的，我会回来的。”
languages.original_text: "Ungrateful scum. We guard them, and they dance on our bones! I will remember that face, and I will come back."

traits.locale_text: “那些忘恩负义的渣滓。我们保护他们，可他们却在我们的骨头上跳舞！我会记住那张脸的，我会回来的。”

languages.text: « Quelle bande d'ingrats... On s'évertue à les protéger, et eux, ils nous remercient en dansant sur nos cadavres ! Je n'oublierai pas ce visage. Et je reviendrai. »
languages.original_text: "Ungrateful scum. We guard them, and they dance on our bones! I will remember that face, and I will come back."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle bande d'ingrats... On s'évertue à les protéger, et eux, ils nous remercient en dansant sur nos cadavres ! Je n'oublierai pas ce visage. Et je reviendrai. »

languages.text: "Nankör pislikler. Biz onları koruyalım, onlar kemiklerimizin üzerinde dans etsin! O suratı unutmayacağım. Geri geleceğim."
languages.original_text: "Ungrateful scum. We guard them, and they dance on our bones! I will remember that face, and I will come back."
